summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Hany Beller to have signing authority on his bank account at Deutsche Bank. The letter is dated September 30, 2013, and is addressed to Amanda Kirby in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual authorizing Hany Beller to have signing authority on his bank account.

persons.name: Hany Beller
persons.context: Hany Beller is granted signing authority on Jeffrey Epstein's bank account as per Epstein's authorization.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the letter from Jeffrey Epstein regarding the signing authority.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Hany Beller to have signing authority on his bank account, indicating a level of trust and professional relationship.

keyFacts: The document is a letter dated September 30, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Hany Beller to have signing authority on his bank account.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
